DOC.brief_title: Effects Daily Nutritional Supplementation Combination With Eurhythmics Training ( NUDAL )
DOC.criteria: Communitydwelling male female , age ≥ 65 year Able walk unassisted 15 meter MMSE ≥ 24 point Having obtain his/her inform consent Serum 25 ( OH ) Vitamin D > 100 nmol/L blood sample Screening Current regular ( define > 3x /week ) use high protein oral nutritional supplement Milk protein allergy ( Lactose intolerance ) Severe visual impairment ( correct near vision < 0.2 eye ) Severe neurological , orthopaedic , rheumatologic psychiatric illness cause inability understand follow task instruction walk 15 meter without assistance ( clinically questionable , final decision make senior physician ) Terminal illness life expectancy le 12 month , determine physician
